company: Western Washington University Capstone, acquired by US Navy
title: Water Weather Station IoT System
description: Developed a real-time IoT water data collection system adopted by America's Navy® in 2024, focusing on scalabling API infrastructure and optimized PostgreSQL database.

tool: React Native, Expo, Firebase, BigCommerce, Zendesk
title: Car Seat Safety Hub App
description: Built a cross-platform app providing parents with localized car seat resources. Integrated APIs for BigCommerce, Zendesk, and Firebase. Offline access and 15-min incremental updates included.

title: Band Portfolio Website
description: Built a static, content-editable website for a band featuring music links, event tickets, blog posts, and a media gallery. Designed for dynamic functionality and free hosting.

title: Chroma Choice
description: A color guessing game where users identify hex values visually. Features a playful UI and replayability through randomized challenges.
